glosses: to stretch, tight, tighten, contract, strain, tauten
(gamer slang) to grind an account, to increase an account's stats by playing the game
to be stressed out, to be in a state of pressure

etymology:
From Ottoman Turkish قاصمق (kasmak, “to stretch, tight, tighten”), from Proto-Turkic *K(i)as- (“to constrict, tighten”).
Cognates
Cognate with Southern Altai кастаар (kastaar), Turkmen gasmak, Tuvan кастаар (kastaar), Uyghur قاساماق (qasamaq).
